description.value: You fight with effortless expertise with grippli weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Blowgun]{Blowgun}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Hatchet]{Hatchet}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Scythe]{Scythe}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Shortbow]{Shortbow}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Composite Shortbow]{Composite Shortbow}, or grippli weapons in which you are trained.
